fr.dc.iamcore.services.dao.impl

Class IdentityHibernateDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dc.iamcore.services.dao.impl.IdentityHibernateDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityDAOInterface

    public class IdentityHibernateDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdentityDAOInterface
    This is the implementation class for the data access object which implements all the methods in the data access object interface
    Author:
    DEEP

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(Identity identity)
      This method searches for an identity from the target path whose id matches the user input and deletes it from the target path.
      java.util.List<Identity> readAll()
      This method is used to read all identities from the target path.
      java.util.List<Identity> search(Identity identity)
      This method is used to search for an identity from the target path whose first name, last name and email matches the user input.
      void update(Identity identity)
      This method searches for an identity from the target path whose id matches the user input and updates it in the target path.
      void write(Identity identity)
      This method is used to write an identity to the target path.

    • Method Detail

      • readAll

        public java.util.List<Identity> readAll()
        This method is used to read all identities from the target path. This method overrides the readAll method in the data access object interface.

        Return type: List

        Specified by:
        readAll in interface IdentityDAOInterface
        Returns:
        The list containing the identities read from the target path

      • write

        public void write(Identity identity)
        This method is used to write an identity to the target path. This method overrides the write method in the data access object interface.

        Return type: void

        Specified by:
        write in interface IdentityDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity to write to the target path

      • search

        public java.util.List<Identity> search(Identity identity)
        This method is used to search for an identity from the target path whose first name, last name and email matches the user input. This method overrides the search method in the data access object interface.

        Return type: List

        Specified by:
        search in interface IdentityDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity whose id is to be searched for in the target path
        Returns:
        The list containing the identities in the target path which match the first name, last name and email entered by the user input

      • update

        public void update(Identity identity)
        This method searches for an identity from the target path whose id matches the user input and updates it in the target path. This method overrides the update method in the data access object interface.

        Return type: void

        Specified by:
        update in interface IdentityDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity whose id is to be searched for and updated in the target path

      • delete

        public void delete(Identity identity)
        This method searches for an identity from the target path whose id matches the user input and deletes it from the target path. This method overrides the delete method in the data access object interface.

        Return type: void

        Specified by:
        delete in interface IdentityDAOInterface
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity whose id is to be searched for and deleted from the target path
